activities: CIC Plus provides an innovative online forms management solution to help HR and payroll departments comply with federal, state, and local requirements.
personaldata: Client employee data. The data does not include manually processed data.
privacyprograms: Self-regulatory privacy program that adheres to the Safe Harbor Privacy Principles.
recoursemech: CIC Plus will use JAMS to investigate unresolved complaints concerning our compliance with the Safe Harbor Framework.
